Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with 13 months history of Body Aches. pt is a 25 yr old female graphic designer. admits to drinking 6-12 beers per night she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 151 cm, Weight 45.2 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed SAVELLA - 50 mg 2x day, and ordered ESR.

content2.Unmatched: beers per night she denies ever using cigarettes

td.content: s:a female aged 27 yrs presents w/ c/o 9 days h/o Body Aches. o:Height 150 cm, Weight 44.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:patient with Body Aches. she has had several such episodes over past 2 years. she is a female graphic designer aged 27 years. o:Height 151 cm, Weight 45.5 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed LYRICA - 150 mg daily.
